metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35507 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: There's a flaw in bfd_pef_parse_function_stubs of bfd/pef.c in binutils inversions prior to 2.34 which could allow an attacker who is able to submita crafted file to be processed by objdump to cause a NULL pointerdereference. The greatest threat of this flaw is to applicationavailability.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
